review: Works great for watching Youtube videos on my TV.  Easy to install, but you'll need a free HDMI port on your TV, a good wifi connection and a Google account to use it.  It's not powered by the HDMI port.  I had to use the included USB cable and plug it into the USB port on my TV to get power.  It also includes a plug-in AC power adapter, in case your TV doesn't have a USB port.  You gotta have an HDMI port on your TV to use it.  If your TV doesn't have an HDMI port, it's probably time to buy a new TV anyway.You need to download Chromecast and Google Play apps to use it.  At first I installed the apps on an iPad.  The kids were always using the iPad, so switched and installed the apps on my iPod Touch instead.  The iPod Touch makes a great 'remote control' for watching Youtube videos without tying up the iPad.  I didn't try installing these apps on an Android device or PC.
